metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for data engineering, cloud workflows, and developer productivity

plugins.name: databricks-executor
plugins.description: Execute Python, SQL, Scala, or R code on Databricks clusters via the Execution Context API

plugins.name: repo-creator
plugins.description: Quickly create and publish repos with the /repo command. Supports personal and work repositories, GitHub publishing, and virtual environment setup (venv, conda, npm).
